LFADS.RunCollection¶

classLFADS.RunCollection(rootPath, name, datasetCollection, runParams)[source]¶

Bases: handle, matlab.mixin.Copyable, matlab.mixin.CustomDisplay

A set of LFADS.Run instances sharing common parameter settings but utilizing different subsets of LFADS.Dataset insstances in a LFADS.DatasetCollection. A RunCollection is a logical grouping of otherwise independent LFADS runs, which are constrained to share a common Dataset collection and run parameters.

Properties

name = ''[source]¶

Name of this RunCollection, determines its relative path on disk

comment = ''[source]¶

Textual comment for convenience

rootPath = ''[source]¶

Root path on disk under which individual Runs will be stored

datasetCollection = None[source]¶

DatasetCollection instance

params = None[source]¶

RunParams instance

Read-only Properties

Read-onlyruns = None[source]¶

Dependent Properties

DependentnRuns = None[source]¶
DependentnDatasets = None[source]¶
Dependentpath = None[source]¶

unique folder within rootPath including name_paramSuffix

DependentfileShellScriptTensorboard = None[source]¶

path the location where a shell script to launch TensorBoard for all runs will be written

Methods

[rc] = RunCollection(rootPath, name, datasetCollection, runParams)[source]¶
Parameters:
  • rootPath (string) – location on disk under which run collections will be saved
  • name (string) – unique identifier for this RunCollection, also used as subfolder within rootPath
  • datasetCollection (LFADS.DatasetCollection) – DatasetCollection to be used by runs within this RunCollection
  • runParams (LFADS.RunParams) – Parameter settings which will be used uniformly by all runs, will also be serialized in the folder path
clearRuns()[source]¶

Flush list of runs

filterRuns()[source]¶

Apply selection mask to list of runs

Parameters:mask (logical or indices) – selection mask applied to .runs
[str] = getTensorboardCommand()[source]¶

Generates the shell command text to launch a TensorBoard displaying all runs within this collection

Returns:cmd – Command which can luanch TensorBoard from command line
Return type:string
[f] = writeTensorboardShellScript()[source]¶

Generates the shell command text to launch a TensorBoard displaying all runs within this collection and saves it to a file inside the RunCollection’s path

Returns:file – Path to the shell script, will match .fileShellScriptTensorboard
Return type:string
addRun(run)[source]¶

Adds a LFADS.Run to the collection. Note that LFADS.Run instances are generally added to their Run Collection upon construction, so calling this method is likely unnecessary for the end user.

Parameters:run (LFADS.Run) – Run to add to the collection.

Methods

[rc2] = copyClearRuns()[source]¶

Make a copy of this run collection, but without the runs inside

Returns:rc – Copy of RunCollection sans runs
Return type:LFADS.RunCollection
